# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, we believe it holds significant value for individuals like yourself who appreciate excellence. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $10000. This opportunity is exclusive and tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to quality. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
